edu.rpi.tw.data.csv.impl

Class TemplateFillerColumnContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.rpi.tw.data.csv.impl.TemplateFillerColumnContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TemplateFiller
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CSVRecordTemplateFiller

    public abstract class TemplateFillerColumnContext
extends java.lang.Object
implements TemplateFiller
    Expands the column-contextual variables in the given template. Does NOT do the context-free (use EnhancementParameters for that). Does NOT do the row/cell contexts. See also CSVRecordTemplateFiller, DefaultEnhancementParameters, PropertyNameFactory
